amendment.description: Amendment allows parents in consultation with the Individualized Family Service Plan (IFSP) team to determine the appropriate educational setting for each child.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 108-79 to provide parents in consultation with theIndvidualized Family Service Plan (IFSP) team the ability to decide what setting is appropriate for each child.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nethercutt amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Nethercutt.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nethercutt amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
